Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2879 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.21.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-2879 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.21.6-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package golang is earlier than 1.21.6-1, affected by CVE-2022-2879
